meanings.sent2: The grandmother always called her grandchildren 'dearies'.
meanings.sent3: The teacher smiled at her students and said, 'Good morning, dearies!'
meanings.sent4: The kind old man at the park greeted everyone as 'dearies'.
meanings.sent5: In the story, the fairy godmother referred to the children as her little dearies.
